snippet: Our call for submissions for how the Tappan Zee Bridge might be reimagined drew some thoughtful suggestions, including an "edible bridge" and a call to demolish the thing.
abstract: Our call for submissions for how the Tappan Zee Bridge might be reimagined drew some thoughtful suggestions, including an "edible bridge" and a call to demolish the thing.

headline.main: The Tappan Zee's Future, According to Readers
